name: change-line-length
description: This package is a quick and simple solution for changing the line length of a text by inserting, removing or moving line breaks. The new length of the lines can be set dynamically, that is, based on a specific word or character such as a semicolon or comma, or determined by the number of characters per line. An example of use would be inserting a line break (or newline) in front of or behind a certain delimiter, to generate a list from an enumeration
author: Leidson Cruz<https://github.com/leidsoncruz>
